message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that you've shown interest in. I'm asking for $175 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
Hey Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While $120 is a bit lower than I can go right now, I'm willing to come down to $140 to see if we can make this work.  Let me know what you think.
I'm still a bit far from my budget, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $130?
